segments.text: Hello , May I speak to Mary , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Hi Tom , how have you been ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just fine . I see . Aren ’ t you busying tomorrow evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Akha . No , I guess I ’ ll be free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , why not dine out together and go to the moves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I ‘ l l pick you up at 6 o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your inviting me . See you then . Bye Tom .
segments.speaker: S2
